Title: EPiServer CMS ElencySolutions.ImageMap.Properties
Description:
The project provides two new EPiServer properties (ImageMap and HotSpot).

The properties use a silverlight image map editor for image map editing and hot spot picking.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

The ImageMap properties are for use in EPiServer CMS 6 and provide a user with an easy way to create image maps and pick hot spots on an image.

The properties serialize and deserialize there values into strongly typed objects so the data is straight forward to work with for the developer.

For more information please refer to the usage instructions below and the following blog posts:

ElencySolutions Image Map and Hot Spot Editor v1.0 Released

Requirements

To be able to use this plug-in you will need to have EPiServer CMS 6 or later which can be downloaded from EPiServer World

By far, the easiest way to install this is to install the nuget package from the EPiServer nuget feed
